nodes.text: D6 was an astromech droid who served in the Alliance to Restore the Republic during the lead-up to the Galactic Civil War. Around 0 BBY, D6 was assigned to Jory of Red Flight who was deployed to assist Extraction Team Bravo in the Wobani system. During the extraction, D6 was tasked with repairing Jory's top port-side engine so that it would no longer expel smoke after Jory collided with a small asteroid while talking to Red Four.
D6 first appeared in the 2016 Star Wars Battlefront: Rogue One: X-wing VR Mission, a downloadable virtual reality add-on to the 2015 canon video game Star Wars Battlefront.
